timeline.author: ssilvert

replies.bodyText: when test passes doesn't that mean that this fix fixes both issues?
replies.author: edewit

replies.bodyText: We currently have no way how to test KEYCLOAK-12189 as i18n support was temporarily removed from the new Account Console and the test related to KEYCLOAK-12189 was ignored for now. So even though we cannot confirm KEYCLOAK-12189 was fixed by this PR, it's safe to do this change.
replies.author: vmuzikar
